Disease.content:

Paragraph: One hundred and twenty - two cycles of GEM - P were administered in total ( median 3 cycles ; range 1 - 6 ) .

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions "GEM-P" as the disease entity, which is an abbreviation for Gemcitabine and Platinum-based chemotherapy. Therefore, the only disease entity in the paragraph is "GEM-P".
